item.title: War
item.description: In mahAvaMsha, an arhat consoles Dutthagamani that out of all the thousands of people his war killed, only one had taken the bauddha precepts, so he actually got the karma of killing 1.5. Some view soldiery as sacrificing future lives as well for the country. A bauddha soldier could be considered a tragic hero who is forced to sacrifice his principles out of circumstance.
